channel.title: Publications on Taosheng Xu
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Taosheng Xu

item.title: miRBaseConverter: an R/Bioconductor package for converting and retrieving miRNA name, accession, sequence and family information in different versions of miRBase
[R package]miRBaseConverter: A comprehensive and high-efficiency tool for converting and retrieving the information of miRNAs in different miRBase versions
item.description: miRBaseConverter is an R/Bioconductor package for converting and retrieving the definition of miRNAs ( Names, Accessions, Sequences, Families and others) in different miRBase versions ( From miRBase version 6 to version 21 [ The latest version ] ). A tiny built-in database is embedded in the miRBaseConverter R package for retrieving miRNA information efficiently.

item.title: CancerSubtypes: an R/Bioconductor package for molecular cancer subtype identification, validation and visualization
[R package]CancerSubtypes: Cancer subtypes identification, validation and visualization based on genomic data
item.description: The R/Bioconductor package CancerSubtypes integrates the current common computational biology methods for cancer subtypes identification and provides a standardized framework for cancer subtype analysis based multi-omics data, such as gene expression, miRNA expression, DNA methylation and others.

item.title: Identifying Cancer Subtypes from miRNA-TF-mRNA Regulatory Networks and Expression Data
